title: Oasis Hotels

what.title: What is Oasis?
what.content: Oasis Hotels & Resorts is a luxury hotel chain that owns 4 properties spread into 9 hotels in the attractive Cancun, Mexico - Caribbean Coast.

goal.title: The main objectives
goal.content: In order to strengthen and improve business operations, increase and optimize security and create memorable guest experiences, the chain undertook their digital transformation in 2017 and fully embraced RFID/NFC technology. Hence, they gained better business processing control and achieved to successfully complete all their goals.

cta: Do you own a hotel or resort and want to embrace digital transformation?

review.name: Noelia Llaneza
review.content: Awesome product. The agile methodology is really valuable, and it greatly adds comfort to our guests.
